descs.en: Ross and Monica are leaving their cousins wedding when Monica stops Ross because she forgot her wrap. Monica pleads with Ross to go get it. Ross walks back to the table they were sitting at when his aunt sits down on Monica's wrap. As he pulls the wrap from under his aunt, she asks if he's leaving and says give me a kiss. The aunt puts her hands on his face and Ross is moving is head around to avoid kissing her because she always kisses him on the lips.
descs.zh: 罗斯和莫妮卡正要离开表亲的婚礼因莫妮卡忘记了自己的丝巾而停下。莫妮卡恳求罗斯去帮忙拿回它。当罗斯回到他们坐在的桌子旁时他的姨妈正坐在莫妮卡的丝巾上。当罗斯从他的姨妈下拉开丝巾时，她问他罗斯否要离开并说给我一个吻。罗斯的姨妈将她的手放在他的脸上时，罗斯为了躲避亲吻而动了动头，因为他的姨妈总是喜欢亲吻他的嘴唇。
descs.google_zh: Ross和Monica因Monica（Monica）因为忘记了包裹而停下Ross时，正要离开表亲婚礼。Monica恳求Ross去得到它。当他的姨妈坐在Monica的外套上时，Ross回到他们坐在的桌子旁。当他从姨妈下拉包裹时，她问他是否要离开，说给我一个吻。阿姨将她的手放在他的脸上，而Ross为了避免亲吻而动了动头，因为她总是在嘴唇上亲吻他。

descs.en: Wil Wheaton is talking into the microphone and uses his hand to point at Penny.

descs.google_zh: 当她坐在医院的病床上时，Thirteen走到娄，与她交谈。

descs.en: The drycleaner confirms the identity of the person on the phone Castle's holding up.

descs.en: Ryan stands talking to Castle and Beckett as he repeatedly moves his hand up and down pointing his finger.

descs.en: House tells the man sitting next to Afsoun to leave.

descs.google_zh: Chase博士在走廊上与一位长发女子穿着粉红色连帽运动衫交谈
